updateCredentials

static void updateCredentials(java.lang.Object testRunner)
Set basic authentication headers for all HTTP test requests or just append the username and password to all requests, depending on the authentication method. For all requests with variable endpoints the authentication is set! Requires that the project variables authUser, authPwd and authMethod are set. Possible values for xtf.authMethod: appendCredentials, httpBasic

updateTestStepCredentials

static void updateTestStepCredentials(com.eviware.soapui.impl.support.http.HttpRequestTestStep testStep, java.lang.Object context, java.lang.String authUser = testStep.testCase.testSuite.project.getPropertyValue('authUser', java.lang.String authPwd = testStep.testCase.testSuite.project.getPropertyValue('authPwd', java.lang.String authMethod = testStep.testCase.testSuite.project.getPropertyValue('authMethod', java.lang.String authServiceEndpoint = testStep.testCase.testSuite.project.getPropertyValue('serviceEndpoint')
Set basic authentication headers for one single HTTP test requests or just append the username and password to the request, depending on the authentication method. Endpoint variables are expanded and checked! Requires that the project variables authUser, authPwd and authMethod are set. Possible values for xtf.authMethod: appendCredentials, httpBasic
